summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the municipal light and power system; providing for the acquisition by condemnation of certain property and property rights in Sections 3, 10, 11, 14, 23, 26 and 35 of Township 40 North, Range 43 East, W.M., and in Sections 2, 3, 10, 11, 15, 16, 21, and 22 of Township 39 North, Range 43 East, W.M., as a site for the Boundary Hydroelectric development project as authorized by license of the Federal Power Commission under Project No. 2144 (Pend Oreille River), and providing for payment.
